select a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_name userName, a.sex sex, a.phone, a.mail, a.id_card idCard from t_sys_user a, t_info_client b where a.is_delete = 0 and a.user_id = b.user_id
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
order by a.update_time desc

select a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_name userName, a.sex sex, a.phone, a.mail, a.id_card idCard from t_sys_user a, t_info_client b, t_info_store c where a.is_delete = 0 and a.user_id = b.user_id and b.invite_code = c.invite_code and c.user_id = #{nowUserId}
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
order by a.update_time desc
